name: Winds of Change (itch) (Silthreent)
description:
The winds of change are blowing...help the trees get new leaves by ridding of the old.

The trees all need only one color of leaf each to lose them. Don't ask how or why, nature works in mysterious ways.

Click, or touch, and drag leaves to move them around. Drop it on another leaf to swap it's place.

The trees are nice enough to keep track of the time playing, total moves and moves this round, and how many rounds you've completed. They're also nice enough to not tell you the numbers if you toggle on stress free mode.

Font is from https://kenney.nl, everything else created by me.
